abstract: Stanford University researchers Dr David Lentink and Eric Gutierrez fit bird with pair of protective googles and induced it to fly through laser beams in order to study flight dynamics; results are published in journal Bioinspiration and Biomimetics.

keywords.value: Laser (Light Amplification by Stimulated Emission of Radiation)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: A goggle-wearing small parrot helps scientists understand flight, and disabuses them of some false assumptions.
snippet: A goggle-wearing small parrot helps scientists understand flight, and disabuses them of some false assumptions....

headline.main: It’s a Bird Wearing Goggles, and Flying Through Lasers
headline.print_headline: With Lasers in the Flight Plan, Goggles Are Vital
